title: Rock the Block
overview: Prepare for the ultimate showdown between the fiercest women in the home renovation and design business in Rock the Block. With only four weeks and $175,000 each, HGTV stars Leanne Ford, Mina Starsiak Hawk, Jasmine Roth, and Alison Victoria will face-off to max-out identical properties in the Los Angeles area--with the goal to add the most property value to each home.
